scripts.postinstall: rm -rf htz && rm -rf dist && git clone --recurse-submodules git@github.com:Haaretz/htz-frontend.git htz && gulp && cd dist && concurrently "yarn && yarn bootstrap && HOSTNAME=local yarn workspace @haaretz/haaretz.co.il dev" "gulp watch"
scripts.boot: concurrently "yarn && yarn bootstrap && HOSTNAME=local yarn workspace @haaretz/haaretz.co.il dev" "gulp watch"
